an3.153:1: "Bhikkhus, possessing three qualities … Impure bodily action, impure verbal action, and impure mental action ….
an3.153:2: "Bhikkhus, possessing three qualities … Pure bodily action, pure verbal action, and pure mental action. Possessing these three qualities, the wise, competent, good person preserves himself unmaimed and uninjured; he is blameless and beyond reproach by the wise; and he generates much merit."
